thread.title: Speaker-in-waiting spent years cultivating GOP lawmakers
thread.title_full: Speaker-in-waiting spent years cultivating GOP lawmakers

title: Speaker-in-waiting spent years cultivating GOP lawmakers
text: > Top News Speaker-in-waiting spent years cultivating GOP lawmakers FILE - In this July 20, 2004 file photo, then-California Assembly Republican Leader Kevin McCarthy R-Bakersfield, center, and Senate Republican Leader Sen. Dick Ackerman, R-Fullerton, left, wheel an cappuccino machine into the Governor's office at the Capitol in Sacramento, Calif. Sen. John Burton, D-San Francisco, who in the past has delivered freshly brewed coffee to his meetings with the governor, announced yesterday that he would withhold the services of his coffee maker after his "girlie men" comment over the weekend. McCarthy, the majority leader whoâ€™s favored to become the next speaker of the House, has energetically nurtured GOP legislators in the House since he was elected to Congress nine years ago. (AP Photo/Steve Yeater, File)
